data.name: Todo Planner
content: A modern to-do & personal planning web application designed to help users stay organized and productive.

Features include task management with create, organize, and complete tasks functionality, smart scheduling with due dates, reminders, and calendar integration, project organization for better workflow, tags & labels for efficient categorization, recurring tasks that repeat automatically, and smart notifications to never miss a deadline.
Built with a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices, offering both light and dark mode themes for comfortable viewing in any environment.

data.name: Portfolio Terminal
content: An interactive terminal-inspired portfolio website showcasing my work in Cybersecurity, Network Engineering, and DevOps with a unique retro command-line interface.

Features a dual-mode interface with both GUI and terminal modes, multilingual support (English/French), dark/light theme toggle, and smooth animations. The terminal mode includes a fully functional command-line interface with autocomplete, command history, and a custom file system navigation experience.

Built from scratch using vanilla JavaScript with no dependencies, demonstrating clean code architecture and modern web development practices. Optimized for performance with lazy loading, responsive design, and accessibility features.

data.name: DevOps Internship Infrastructure
content: Two-month internship delivering a full DevOps infrastructure transformation, moving from a Proxmox-based lab environment to a production-ready setup tailored for a growing startup.
Designed and deployed HAProxy load balancing, Harbor as a hardened private container registry, and Rancher for unified Kubernetes and container fleet management.

Industrialized the deployments with Ansible playbooks to provide reproducible, idempotent Infrastructure as Code across laboratory and production environments while handling SELinux, firewalld, and port conflicts on AlmaLinux.
